register_page.page_purpose: Step 1 of 3: Securely collect personal identification information (PII) to initiate your Red Cross membership, volunteer, or donor profile. This is where your journey of heroism begins.

hero_section.headline: Save Lives. Join the Red Cross.
hero_section.sub_headline: We take pride in urging all Filipinos to take part in the heroism of the Philippine Red Cross by becoming a full-fledged member, volunteer, or donor.

philsys_integration.feature_headline: Streamline KYC: Use Your National ID
philsys_integration.feature_description: Skip manual entry! Use your **PhilSys National ID (PhilID/ePhilID)** to securely verify your identity and instantly pre-fill key mandatory details (Name, Age, Sex, Birthdate) via a trusted PhilSys verification service, or choose to fill manually.

kyc_option_1.cta_text: Verify with PhilSys National ID to pre-fill details
kyc_option_1.note: You will be securely wrapped to the PhilSys portal for authentication.

profile_data_collection.purpose: If you are not using PhilSys, please provide all necessary details. Mandatory fields are required for compliance and profile integrity. Immediate validation checks are performed for Mobile Number and Email Address.

compliance_trust: Strict compliance with Philippine Data Privacy Act (DPA).
PII stored using industry-leading encryption standards.
Secure, server-side validation for data integrity.
Dedicated to maintaining the tone of trust and humanitarian service.
register_page.step_progress_teaser: You are on Step 1: Registration. Next Steps: Submission, Payment.
register_page.footer_level_cta: Have questions about data privacy? Contact our support team.

login_page.page_purpose: Access your secure profile. This login portal is for existing Red Cross members, staff, and donors to manage their information and program participation.

hero_section.headline: Secure Access to Your Humanitarian Profile.
hero_section.sub_headline: Your data is protected. Log in safely to manage your profile, track donations, or access staff resources. We maintain stringent data protection protocols.

security_access: Encrypted login credentials for maximum security.
Role-based access controls for authorized users.
Session time-out to protect against unauthorized access.
Compliant with all authentication best practices.
login_page.footer_level_cta: Facing technical issues? Contact technical support for immediate assistance.

payment_page.page_purpose: Step 3 of 3: Finalize your registration and activate your membership/program participation through a secure transaction. This completes your enrollment process.

hero_section.headline: Finalize Your Commitment. Secure Your Membership.
hero_section.sub_headline: Your secure transaction is the final step in activating your Red Cross profile. All payments are processed through our trusted, compliant payment gateway.

transaction_details.description: Please enter your payment information. The Red Cross **does not store** any financial PII (credit card number, CVV) on our servers; data is passed directly to the secure gateway for processing.

security_compliance: SSL/TLS encryption for all transaction data.
Clear transaction summary before final charge.

receipt_placeholder.info: Upon successful payment, you will receive an official digital receipt via email, which will include your Transaction ID, Membership Number (if applicable), and a confirmation of your registration status.

payment_page.footer_level_cta: Encountering a payment error? Contact our dedicated billing support.
